PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-00402018-01-29,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
SubjectOrder Terminating the Assignment of the Honourable Kent Hehr and Assigning the Honourable Kirsty Duncan to Assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage and the Minister of Employment and Social Development.
PrecisOrder (1) terminating the assignment of the Honourable Kent Hehr, made by Order in Council P.C. 2017-1106 of August 28, 2017; and (2) assigning the Honourable Kirsty Duncan, a minister of State styled Minister of Sport and Persons with Disabilities, to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage and the Minister of Employment and Social Development.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2018-0012 Publication Date: 2018-02-07
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Ministries and Ministers of State Act
subject: Order Terminating the Assignment of the Honourable Kent Hehr and Assigning the Honourable Kirsty Duncan to Assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage and the Minister of Employment and Social Development.
precis: Order (1) terminating the assignment of the Honourable Kent Hehr, made by Order in Council P.C. 2017-1106 of August 28, 2017; and (2) assigning the Honourable Kirsty Duncan, a minister of State styled Minister of Sport and Persons with Disabilities, to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage and the Minister of Employment and Social Development.
